title: Mordekaisers Ult
body:
I've seen a movement in making champions more skill based lately (i.e., Irelia's revamp including a skill shot ult). Mordekaiser hasn't received a re-work in a while from what I can see and his ult is still very "point-and-click." It makes him a lot less fun to play as a champ generally and can also make him very difficult to outplay if he gets ahead. 

My request/feedback is: make Mord's ult a skill shot.

replies.body:
I think Morde's ult needs to be changed. Overall I feel like its a bad move thematically.

If you were to make it a skillshot you'd have to really buff up the rest of his kit by a lot.
If he gets buffs to go with it like self cast W and 340 base MS then sure.
